short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn a new language with an AI personal tutor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PolyTutor lets you save and study web articles to help you learn a new language based on your interests. By analyzing the content you save, PolyTutor tailors vocabulary lessons to match the words and phrases you encounter most often.

The PolyTutor extension will:

* Save articles directly from the web to your PolyTutor account
* Analyze your saved articles to personalize your language lessons
* Highlight important words in your saved content to help you learn in context
* Allow you to track your progress as you study

Start learning a new language naturally with PolyTutor!
long.fr: Learn a new language with an AI personal tutor.
